DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study determine association Vitamin D deficiency obese child low high density lipoprotein ( HDL ) dysfunctional HDL .
DOC.brief_title: Roles Vitamin D HDL Obese Children
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects identify Department Pediatric - High Body Mass Index ( BMI ) Clinic Dr. Aurelia Radulescu standard care visit . Dr. Radulescu determine subject meet study eligibility requirement . Visit 1 ( Baseline/Screening ) : Consent/assent obtain , medical history , demographic information along height weight collection . Clinical Laboratory testing , although part study , include follow standard care test . The result Vitamin D Lipid profile test share Dr. Li Dr. Radulescu . - Lipid profile - Vitamin D - AST/ALT - Hb A1C - Glucose - CBS w/diff - TSH - BUN , Creatine - UA Subjects place standard care Vitamin D supplementation 12 week . Visit 2 ( 3 month visit ) End Study : Subjects return BMI clinic month 3 follow-up additional clinical laboratory testing ( see visit 1 description test perform ) order assess response Vitamin D supplementation . Subjects previously report abnormal Lipid value Lipid profile repeat visit . Month 3 visit End Study visit .
DOC.criteria: Obese child Vitamin D deficiency Low HDL HIV Hepatitis A Hepatitis B Hepatitis C NonEnglish speaking
